name: NIKE REPLICA STORE
description: a full-stack e-commerce web application that mimics a Nike store. Built with Next.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, it offers product listings, user authentication

name: SHOP-DRESSLY
description: Dress Shop is a full-stack e-commerce web application for purchasing fashion apparel.

name: CRYPTO HUNTER
description: Crypto Hunter is a cryptocurrency tracking web app that provides real-time data on various digital assets. Built with React.js and powered by public crypto APIs
